akas: Fairy Tail Zero World-wide (English title) (eighth season title)
akas from release info: Fairy Tail Zero World-wide (English title) (eighth season title)

1.title: The Lamia Scale Thanksgiving Festival
1.plot: Natsu and Happy is reunited with Lucy one year after the dissolution of the guild. The three raise Fairy Tail rebuilding and go on a journey to find friends.

2.title: Because I Love You
2.plot: The guild Orochi's Fin launched a night raid by releasing a large group of demons on the city of Margaret. Wendy and Sheria rushed through the sky to hit the enemy's main force.

3.title: Avatar
3.plot: Natsu, Lucy, Wendy, Happy and Chales meet with Juvia in Amefurashi Village and discovers that Gray disappeared.

4.title: Underground Fight
4.plot: The Guild of Black Wizards Avatar, plan a strategy of purification. In search of Gray's fate, Natsu, Lucy and Happy, who find the Guild location, will attempt to infiltrate in the enemy area.

5.title: Purification Strategy
5.plot: Believing that Zeref will appear at the location where several deaths will happen, the organization of the black magic, Avatar, will sacrifice an entire city. In order to stop the plan, Natsu and company run to the city of Malba.

6.title: Ikusa-Tsunagi
6.plot: The main members of the Fairy Tail are reunited and behind the Black Wizards of Avatar. But the priest of the sanctuary, Arlok, is determined to do something to carry out the purification strategy.

7.title: Memoirs
7.plot: About 400 years ago, a boy who lost his beloved family, continued his forbidden search and was cursed by the God Ankhseram.

8.title: The Seventh Guild Master
8.plot: After receiving Lucy's letters, the former's members of Fairy Tail, gathered in Magnolia for the rebirth of the guild and the rebuilding of the building.

9.title: Law of Space
9.plot: Under the command of Erza, the members who discovered the truth about the dissolution of the guild, go to the mainland Alvarez to help the sixth master of the guild, Makarov.

10.title: Emperor Spriggan
10.plot: Brandish, of Alvarez's Army, meets Natsu and company on the Caracole Island. Her power is so strong, that extinguishes the completely island. Meanwhile in Alvarez, the Emperor Spriggan returns to the Empire.

11.title: To The Land Abandoned by Gods
11.plot: The wizards met with Makarov and now have to escape from the Alvarez Empire. However, Azir, the King of the Desert and one of the Spriggan 12 is behind them.

12.title: Mavis and Zeref
12.plot: Mavis finally reveals the secrets of her past, including her connection with Fairy Tail, Zeref, and her own sin. The ever-turning gears of fate offer glimpses of hope, but also produce one final, tragic contradiction.

13.title: Fairy Heart
13.plot: The "miracle" that Mavis and Zeref create, has evolved into a powerful form of magic that must keep in secret. Mavis is still regretful for her sin, but the wizards of the guild try to cheer her up. The Alvarez Empire prepares to approach to Ishgar.

14.title: The Magnolia Defensive War
14.plot: Before the battle for Fairy Tail's existence begins, the guild members spend the final night in their own ways. But when Alvarez's vast army launches a surprise attack, Fairy Tail's bond of solidarity is put to the test.

15.title: Morning Star
15.plot: Fairy Tail allowed the Spriggan 12 to invade the city of Magnolia. Lucy comes face to face with Brandish, but gets nervous when she says a name.

16.title: This Parfum Goes To?
16.plot: Magnolia is threatened by another member of the Spriggan 12, Wall. Wall's next target is Fried, who is in Kardia Cathedral.

17.title: Natsu vs. Zeref
17.plot: Wizard guilds all across Fiore join Fairy Tail in the battle against Zeref's armies. Meanwhile, Natsu and Happy speed off to the west to defeat Zeref once and for all.

18.title: Across 400 Years
18.plot: Zeref, sensing his impending death, reveals the secret behind Natsu's birth. After learning the shocking truth, Natsu swings his fist one last time. Meanwhile, Fiore's wizard guilds begin to battle the Alvarez army and the Spriggan 12.

19.title: What I Want to Do
19.plot: While fierce fighting continued throughout Fiore, there was also a case in Magnolia's "Fairy Tail" guild. For the moment the crisis has left, Lucy listens to the voice of Brandish to hear the information of her mother, Leila. But for a moment, hands stained with hatred and anger approached Lucy.

1.title: Fairy Tail
1.plot: Lucy Heartfilia is an inexpert magician who wants to join the "Fairy Tail" guild. During this first adventure, she meets the fire magician called Natsu Dragneel and his blue and talking cat; Happy.

2.title: The Fire Dragon, the Monkey, and the Ox
2.plot: As the Magic Council discuss what is to be done about Fairy Tail's destructive behavior Natsu and Happy return to Fairy Tail bringing Lucy along to join the guild. There she is introduced to the other members. While looking for a job they discover that one of the members of the guild, Macao, has gone missing after going on a job to Mt. Hakone. Natsu, Happy and Lucy go off in search of him.

3.title: Infiltrate! The Everlue Mansion!
3.plot: Lucy has moved into a house in Magnolia where her guild Fairy Tail is located. As Lucy is talking about how great her house is Natsu and Happy barge in, to Lucy's dismay. As she fails to get them to leave she shows them her Celestial spirits before then opening the gate of Canis Minor to form a new contract with the spirit, which she names Plue. After inviting her to join him to make up a team, Natsu presents her with a job to steal a book from the mansion of Duke Everlue. They travel to Shirotsume Town to meet the client who is desperate to get the book. They find ...

4.title: Dear Kaby
4.plot: Natsu has taken care of the guards employed by Duke Everlue and partially destroyed the mansion in the process. Meanwhile, Lucy and Happy struggle with Duke Everlue himself in an attempt to take the book Fairy Tail has been employed to steal. The history behind the writing of the book was secretly hidden within, which Lucy explains during the fight. However, she is convinced the book contains a greater secret... They defeat Duke Everlue, who's magical tunneling results in the mansion collapsing, and deliver the book to the client. On the way back to Fairy Tail Natsu, ...

5.title: The Armoured Wizard
5.plot: Natsu, Happy and Lucy have returned to Fairy Tail after finishing their last job. They become bored just hanging around and decide to go on another job especially since Lucy cannot afford to pay the next months rent since they did not get money for the previous job. Whist deciding, Fairy Tail's strongest female wizard, Erza, returns and requests Natsu and Grey to accompany her on a dangerous job against the dark guild Eisenwald. They set off with Lucy and Happy tagging along...

6.title: The Fairies in the Wind
6.plot: Makarov, master of Fairy Tail, is away at a meeting of local guild masters. Meanwhile, members of the dark guild, Eisenwald, have taken over a train as part of a plot. Its up to Erza, Natsu, Grey, Lucy and Happy to find out what they are planning and stop them. They catch up to the guild at Oshibana station where they reveal their plan to use the speakers in the station to broadcast the Lullaby, a Death Magic flute that kills all who hear it, to the surrounding city. Eisenwald's guild master runs off and Natsu and Grey are sent to stop him. Erza and Lucy defeat the ...

7.title: Flame and Wind
7.plot: Natsu defeats Kageyama, whom Erza determines has the ability to dispel the wind barrier trapping them inside Oshibana Station. Before she can threaten Kageyama into cooperating, he is gravely wounded by his guildmate Karacka to silence him.

8.title: The Strongest Team!!!
8.plot: Natsu finally knocks the wind out of Erigor's sails in a scorcher of a battle - but Fairy Tail's strongest team still has a war to fight when the death flute's dark magic plays an evil scale of epic proportions.

9.title: Natsu, Eat the Village
9.plot: While traveling home with grumbling bellies, the team stumbles upon a deserted village with lots of yummy grub lying around, but Erza's gut tells her something's up. While she investigates, the boys chow on a forest full of odd fungus.

10.title: Natsu vs. Erza
10.plot: Now that they've made it back to Fairy Tail headquarters, it's time for Erza to answer Natsu's challenge! Before things really get heated, the Guild Council stops by to arrest Erza, but Natsu's not about to let her get away that easily!

11.title: Cursed Island
11.plot: Natsu, Happy and Lucy tread some seriously troubled waters when they break guild rules to take an S-class job request and end up shipwrecked on the cursed Galuna Island!

12.title: Moon Drip
12.plot: When the team stumbles upon the infamous demon Deliora frozen in magic ice, cold memories - and a familiar face - are resurrected from Gray's dark past.

13.title: Natsu vs. Hadou no yuuka
13.plot: Gray after being defeated by Reitei is later saved by Natsu. Fairy Tail wizards prepare to fight the side kicks of Gray's old rival Reitei.

14.title: Do What You Must
14.plot: Lucy easily defeats Sherry when Erza arrives on Galuna Island and knocks out Angelica. Uninterested in the situation the islanders are in, Erza captures the heroes and intends to return them to the guild for punishment for taking the S-Class job against Makarov's permission. However, Gray stands up to Erza for the first time, explaining to her that he will defeat Lyon.

15.title: Eternal Magic
15.plot: Ul sacrificed her own body to end Deliora's reign with the Iced Shell technique. Gray cuts a path to the ruins to put the freeze on Lyon - who plans to release the indomitable monster just to see if he can best their mentor!

16.title: Decisive Battle on Galuna Island
16.plot: Up against his rival, Gray is willing to sacrifice everything to stop his childhood friend from melting the ice holding Deliora.

17.title: BURST
17.plot: Natsu puts the heat on the masked wizard and crumbles his plans to use Deliora for himself. The mystery of the village's curse is yet to be solved - Erza prepares to take down the purple moon looming over the island!

18.title: Reach it! To That Sky!
18.plot: Natsu and Erza lift the curse by aiming their attacks at the moon, destroying a magical membrane cast over the island by the Moon Drip, which turns out to be the direct cause of the curse. Furthermore, it is revealed that the curse hadn't turned the islanders into demons.

19.title: Changeling!
19.plot: Natsu absent-mindedly reads a spell that switches the minds and magic of everyone nearby! If they don't figure out how to reverse the spell, they'll be the most pathetic team of Fairy Tail - forever!

20.title: Natsu and the Dragon Egg
20.plot: After coming across an old photo, Lucy and Mirajane reminisce about the earlier days of Fairy Tail.

21.title: Phantom Lord
21.plot: A metal-headed member of the Phantom Lord guild wrecks the Fairy Tail headquarters, but Makarov turns the other cheek. It's another story when someone attacks his own wizard children - he takes the whole guild to war!

22.title: Lucy Heartfilia
22.plot: The powers of the Dragon Slayers clash when Natsu goes head to head with Gajeel! The destruction is interrupted when a guild master takes a critical blow and word that Lucy has been kidnapped sends Natsu over the edge!

23.title: 15 Minutes
23.plot: While a healing mage watches over Makarov, Fairy Tail regroups to plan their next move. But when Jose returns with a giant cannon capable of blasting the entire guild to bits, their time to act ticks away!

24.title: So No One Sees the Tears
24.plot: An ancient guild reveals a dark secret and leaves its only surviving members without a home. Luckily, their new friends are in an awesome guild that loves getting new members!

25.title: A Flower Blooms in the Rain
25.plot: Elfman unleashes the dangerous full body beast mode to pummel Sol. Two of the Element 4 remain, and they must be taken down to stop the Abyss Break spell. Natsu wages war against the wind wizard and the drippy Juvia melts over Gray.

26.title: Wings of Flame
26.plot: Natsu struggles against the strongest of the Element 4 - but a surprise blow from an armor-switching warrior knocks the wind right out of Aria! Meanwhile, Lucy is back in the sinister Jose's grips after a heavy-handed jerk overpowers her protectors.

27.title: The Two Dragon Slayers
27.plot: A seriously scary Natsu tests his mettle against the iron-scaled Gajeel - but he loses steam when there isn't anything around to fuel his firepower! Back on land, the shades are pummeling the guild to the ground!

28.title: Fairy Law
28.plot: Thanks to a celestial smarty, Natsu gets fired up enough to finish off the cocky Gajeel. As Jose is moments from crushing Erza, extreme powers collide when Fairy Tail's fearsome leader makes a blinding return to burn out Phantom Lord.

29.title: My Resolve
29.plot: After a heated chat, Natsu and Gajeel share a dragon-related revelation. The triumphant wizards of Fairy Tail get right to work on a new guild headquarters. When Lucy's friends pay her apartment a visit, she's nowhere to be found!

30.title: Next Generation
30.plot: With Fairy Tail as notoriously wild as ever, the Magic Council expresses its disapproval but is unable to force them to disband. Meanwhile, as Fairy Tail rebuilds, the suggestion that Makarov retires has him considering the possible candidates for his successor: his grandson Laxus, the reclusive Mystogan, and Erza. However, when he hears of the results of Erza and her group's latest mission, he reconsiders retiring.

31.title: A Star Removed from the Sky
31.plot: Things don't go as planned for the coalition - Oracion Seis steal Wendy and Erza is suffering from a poisonous strike from her showdown with Cobra!

32.title: The Spirit King
32.plot: Loke shares his unsettling story with Lucy. Refusing to let her friend fade away forever, Lucy challenges the authority of the almighty ruler of the skies himself!

33.title: The Tower of Heaven
33.plot: The team takes a moment to kick back at a luxurious resort, but the vacation is cut short when a crew of dangerous rogues catches the wizards with their guards down and swipe Erza and Happy!

34.title: Jellal
34.plot: Natsu and the crew track the kidnappers to the looming Tower of Heaven where a demented figure from Erza's past plans to activate a devastating forbidden magic with her as the living sacrifice!

35.title: Voice of Darkness
35.plot: Erza's flashback continues. Her magical prowess awakened in the revolt against the slaves' oppressors, but she failed to save Jellal. Now she has no choice but to fight her former friend to stop him from releasing horrors upon the world.

36.title: Heaven's Game
36.plot: Natsu is temporarily declawed when he gets stuck in some stubborn headgear, but he uses his dome to defeat a kitty-loving baddy. It's all a game to Jellal, who brings in three twisted wizards from the Assassin's Guild.

37.title: Armor of the Heart
37.plot: Erza asks Gray and Natsu to form a team with her to stop a corrupt guild from using a dark magic that has the power to sap the lives of everyone in Fiore!

38.title: Destiny
38.plot: Erza slices through a samurai showdown with the sharpest of the Assassin's Guild wizards and heads straight for Jellal - can she defeat him before the Council fires the destructive Etherion beam?

39.title: Give Our Prayers to the Sacred Light
39.plot: As Jellal's plan falls into place, Erza is suddenly seconds from losing her body to resurrect Zeref! All hope seems lost unless her fire-breathing friend has enough flame in him to save her.

40.title: Titania Falls
40.plot: Natsu works on wrecking the tower, much to the possessed wizard's aggravation - who gets a taste of the Dragon Slayer's true power. As the aftershock of the Etherion blast threatens to take everyone out, Erza decides to take one for the team.

41.title: Home
41.plot: Friendship prevails, Erza says farewell to old pals, and the strongest team of Fairy Tail return home to a bevy of surprises. Not only is the guild hall bigger and better than before--a couple new members have joined the ranks!

42.title: Battle of Fairy Tail
42.plot: Magnolia's annual Harvest Festival begins! The contest progresses joyfully until the arrival of Laxus Dreyar and the Thunder Legion, who start the Battle of Fairy Tail.

43.title: Defeat Your Friends to Save Your Friends
43.plot: Makarov and Natsu are sitting ducks while the rest of the wizards battle each other to exhaustion. Laxus taunts the guild master with blackmail, but there's still a dim light of hope - some of the strongest wizards still remain.

44.title: Thunder Palace
44.plot: After Erza takes on Evergreen, Laxus sends the guild a high-voltage threat! While the wizards search the city for the wired-up bully, Lucy and Happy are ambushed by creepy dolls!

45.title: Advent of Satan
45.plot: Just when it seems she's out of luck, Lucy's most defiant - and amorous - celestial spirit saves her from death by dollies. Elsewhere in the city, the guild's sweetest member makes a wicked transformation in a struggle to stop Fried.

46.title: Clash at Kardia Cathedral!
46.plot: The Thunder Legion is defeated, but time ticks away for Fairy Tail to stop the Thunder Palace from frying the whole city. While Natsu puts the heat on Laxus, Erza prepares to dismantle the massive threat over Magnolia.

47.title: Triple Dragon
47.plot: After a telepathic pep talk, the Fairy Tail wizards put their quarrels aside to help Erza take the Thunder Palace down. With part of his plan foiled and another Dragon Slayer entering the fray, Laxus charges up for a thunderous attack.

48.title: Fantasia
48.plot: The wrath of Laxus takes a shocking turn and a resilient fire-breather takes one last stand to stop the war. Despite the damage, the Fairy Tail wizards muster up the strength to put on a dazzling show for the Fantasia parade!

49.title: The Day of Fated Meeting
49.plot: Fairy Tail picks up the pieces after their battle with Laxus. When Lucy's told today will be a fateful day for her, she puts all her might into meeting the man who will bring her biggest dreams to fruition - only to realize where she truly belongs.

50.title: Special Request: Watch Out for the Guy You Like
50.plot: Lovesick Juvia buys a passion potion with hopes to get her favorite icy guy to warm up to her. When the wrong people catch a whiff, the whole guild gets off on the wrong foot! Meanwhile, Lucy loses her cool when she thinks she's a fire wizard's new crush!

51.title: Love & Lucky
51.plot: Lucy's dad pays a visit to Magnolia to ask his lovely daughter for a favor, but she doesn't buy it. When the trade guild her pop is gunning to join is attacked by burglars, Lucy races to save the day.

52.title: Allied Forces, Assemble!
52.plot: To defeat the dark guild Oración Seis, Fairy Tail delegates Natsu, Erza, Gray, and Lucy to join members from Blue Pegasus, Lamia Scale, and Cait Shelter in a joint effort. Everyone is stunned, however, when the representative from Cait Shelter arrives: a young girl named Wendy.

53.title: Enter the Oración Seis!
53.plot: The coalition of conjurers gathers at their meeting place to discuss their plan to stop Oracion Seis. But when the allies are ambushed, the crew get a taste of the evil prowess they're up against!

54.title: Maiden of the Sky
54.plot: With Erza slowly being poisoned to death, Carla reveals that Wendy's powers as a Sky Dragon Slayer can heal Erza, which sends everyone off to rescue their friends. However, Natsu, Gray, and Carla are inhibited by members of the dark guild Naked Mummy.

55.title: The Girl and the Ghost
55.plot: Frightened and conflicted, Wendy is coerced into bringing an evil wizard - whom she remembers fondly - back from the brink of death. Meanwhile, Natsu and Gray are sidelined by some monkey business when a goofy guild stands in their way to save Wendy!

56.title: Dead Grand Prix
56.plot: With Wendy and Carla in tow, Natsu and Gray rush to heal their friend, but they're sidetrack by an attack from a deceptively quick member of Oracion Seis! Rival ice wizards team up in a high-speed battle to put the brakes on Racer.

57.title: Darkness
57.plot: The sixth member of Oracion Seis finally awakens from his slumber. When Erza is finally back to full strength, she rushes to find Jellal and stop him before he releases the chaotic power of Nirvana!

58.title: Celestial Skirmish
58.plot: Lucy goes solo against an identity thief who has her own celestial powers - but she can't compare when it comes to the coalition member's compassion for her companions in combat! Nirvana already starts to take effect on the wizards within its radius.

59.title: Jellal of Days Gone By
59.plot: Angel is defeated and Lucy together with Natsu end up falling down a giant waterfall, where they reunite with Gray, Lyon, and Sherry. Wendy reveals to Carla her past concerning Jellal and how she came to Cait Shelter. Meanwhile, Erza finds an amnesiac Jellal at the site of Nirvana.

60.title: March to Destruction
60.plot: Erza puts her heart into convincing Jellal to cancel the self-destruction spell, but Brain is two steps ahead of them. When Nirvana morphs into an ancient city on legs and targets an unsuspecting guild, Natsu and Happy fight Cobra to try to stop it!

61.title: Super Aerial Battle: Natsu vs. Cobra!
61.plot: As the ancient city of Nirvana continues its path towards Cait Shelter, Natsu and Happy take a pounding from Cobra's poisonous strikes. But the power of a true dragon slayer should never be underestimated - as long as Happy can keep him off the ground!

62.title: Wizard Saint Jura
62.plot: Jura's strength is rock solid as he steps up to shut Brain down. Meanwhile, Natsu and Happy are sick as dogs under the effects of Cobra's poison, and Nirvana's march has the fire wizard floored - unless some Sky magic can fix him!

63.title: Your Words
63.plot: There's still one Oracion Seis member left standing, and Nirvana doesn't show any signs of stopping! They have to defeat Midnight and a talking staff! Erza and Jellal try their hand at cracking the sorcerer's mirror magic, but things get ugly quick.

64.title: Zero
64.plot: Erza uses sheer force and battle smarts to see straight through Midnight's illusions in a mind-warping fight to the finish. But when the last of the six generals drops, the guild master's super destructive split personality breaks free!

65.title: From Pegasus to Fairies
65.plot: As Zero fires on Cait Shelter, Blue Pegasus's ship Christina, held together by Lyon, Sherry, and Ren, destroy one of Nirvana's legs and cause it to miss. Hibiki relays the details of the plan to stop Nirvana: within 20 minutes, the six legs of Nirvana must be destroyed at the same time.

66.title: The Power of Feelings
66.plot: The coalition coordinates a team attack to end Nirvana's course of destruction. But before they can make their final strike, Natsu faces Zero in a fierce battle to the finish! Will an old enemy get in the way, or lend a helping hand?

67.title: I'm with You
67.plot: Not even being sent to a land of nothingness can keep the power of the dragon down as Natsu fully unleashes a newfound power! Now the team can attack Nirvana with a unified strike! But what happens when another force comes after their new friends?

68.title: A Guild for One
68.plot: Agents from the Magic Council dispatched to the site of Nirvana's fall arrest Jellal; when everyone else resists, Erza stops them and urges the officials to take Jellal away, though she is devastated by the outcome.

69.title: Call of the Dragon
69.plot: The coalition parts ways and Fairy Tail welcomes their newest members to the guild! Then, Gray informs Natsu about a lady who claims she met a dragon recently. With hopes of finding their long lost guardian, two Dragon Slayers end up at a creepy hotel.

70.title: Natsu vs. Gray!!
70.plot: Duped by his rival and a strange saleswoman, Natsu finds himself in fiery fisticuffs against a very unlikely foe! Erza and Lucy know something's up, but they have some scaly copycats to handle before they can help their friend out of a bind!

71.title: Friendship Overcomes the Dead
71.plot: With Natsu trapped inside her magic-sapping monstrosity, Daphne flies straight for Fairy Tail! As the guild fights to protect Magnolia from annihilation, Makarov gives Gray the third degree.

72.title: A Fairy Tail Wizard
72.plot: The only wizard who can defeat the rampaging Dragonoid is inside the Dragonoid. Since Gray's plan didn't pan out like he hoped, Fairy Tail's only hope is to get Natsu fired up enough to get himself out of the hot seat!

73.title: Rainbow Cherry Blossoms
73.plot: It's cherry blossom season in Magnolia, and Fairy Tail is preparing for a huge celebration. No one's as excited as Lucy, but when she catches a cold on a mission, she finds herself alone during the festivities and reflects on her time in the guild.

74.title: Wendy's First Big Job!?
74.plot: Wendy takes her first big assignment--one that sends her to the theater where Natsu and the others once performed in a disastrous play. Happy and Freed are assigned to help her out, but a few other wizards can't help but tag along.

75.title: 24-Hour Endurance Road Race
75.plot: The wizards go head to head as the guild competes in an endurance race where anything goes (except flying magic). Will anyone be able to beat Jet, the reigning champion? And what's the terrible punishment for the loser that Makarov keeps talking about?

76.title: Gildarts
76.plot: Gildarts--Fairy Tail's strongest wizard--returns from a hundred-year quest that even he couldn't complete. After remembering more peaceful times when Lisanna was still alive, Natsu visits Gildarts and discovers that the wizard has seen a black dragon.

77.title: Earth Land
77.plot: Mystogan's secret identity is revealed to Wendy and Carla as a powerful magic transports Fairy Tail--along with the rest of Magnolia--to another world. What does this other realm want with the wizards, and how are Happy and Carla involved?

78.title: Edolas
78.plot: Natsu and the few remaining wizards travel to the world of Edolas in an attempt to rescue the captured city of Magnolia. It's a place where nothing is as it seems and magic is scarce. Plus, there's something strangely familiar about the people there...

79.title: Fairy Hunter
79.plot: The Fairy Tail in the parallel plane of Edolas is full of guild mates who act the exact opposite of their earth counterparts. Lucy is a tough-as-nails leader, Erza is a vicious enemy of the wizards, and Carla and Happy seem to be worshipped--and feared.

80.title: Key of Hope
80.plot: Natsu and his team travel to the black market in order to gear up with some magical contraband. There, the scary version of Lucy comes face to face with the normal version of Lucy, who just might be the only person in Edolas who can use magic.

81.title: Fireball
81.plot: As the kingdom of Edolas gets closer to draining magic from the captured city of Magnolia, Natsu meets a bizarro version of himself--one who's only at home behind the wheel of a car. Meanwhile, Gajeel and his Edolas doppelganger get along swimmingly.

82.title: Welcome Home
82.plot: Natsu's team arrives in the capital city and discovers that the entire town of Magnolia has been turned into a giant crystal. After Carla helps them come up with a plan, they attempt to infiltrate the palace--with disastrous consequences.

83.title: Extalia
83.plot: After a terrible betrayal, Lucy, Natsu, and Wendy are imprisoned beneath the palace. Meanwhile, Carla and Happy discover a world of cats just like them. There, they learn the truth about their duty, and their lives are revealed to be full of lies.

84.title: Fly, to Our Friends!
84.plot: After turning their backs on their homeland, Carla and Happy search for a way to save their friends. On a small farm, they meet some fellow Exceeds who may have more in common with Happy and Carla than the Fairy Tail cats realize.

85.title: Code ETD
85.plot: Happy and Carla manage to rescue Lucy from the Edolas version of Erza, only to be chased by an army of Exceeds. As the dragon slayers are drained of their power in the dungeons, the king activates Code ETD and starts an unexpected rebellion.

86.title: Erza vs. Erza
86.plot: The Royal Army's true intentions are revealed! Meanwhile, a few familiar faces show up to save Wendy and Natsu. When the Edolas version of Erza meets Earth's Erza, a fierce, no-holds-barred battle begins.

87.title: These Are Lives!!!!
87.plot: Natsu, Gray, and Lucy face off against members of the Royal Army in an insane amusement park full of lethal rides and swarms of monsters. Elsewhere, Panther Lily faces off against Gajeel in the sky.

88.title: For Pride's Sake, the River of Stars
88.plot: When Lucy goes head-to-head with an old man who is able to turn into a giant, tentacled monster, Virgo gives her a new weapon. Meanwhile, Gray fights for the key to the army's destructive weapon.

89.title: The Apocalyptic Dragon Chain Cannon
89.plot: Wendy and Carla visit Extalia to warn the queen of the cat-filled city's impending doom, but are met with a violent welcome. Natsu and Gray plot to use the Royal Army's own weapons against them--but are captured by Erza.

90.title: The Boy Back Then
90.plot: As everyone unites to try to stop the Fairy Tail lacrima from crashing into Extalia, Queen Chagot makes a shocking admission and the truth behind the Exceeds is revealed! Will anyone be able to stop the Royal Army's plot?

91.title: Dragon Sense
91.plot: As Panther Lily recovers from a devastating attack, Erza Knightwalker sends her forces after the Exceeds. The king attacks from within an armored dragon that absorbs magic power. Luckily, there are a few dragon slayers around.

92.title: O Living Ones
92.plot: Two Erzas fight each other in the ruins of Extalia! The king's dragon armor takes a terrifying new form! And as the Royal Army closes in on Lucy and the others, the Edolas Fairy Tail must decide whose side they're on!

93.title: I'm Standing Right Here
93.plot: The dragon slayers continue to fight, joining forces in a devastating combo attack. But even if the king is defeated, Mystogan has enacted a plan that will forever change Edolas, and could mean big things for Panther Lilly.

94.title: Bye-Bye Edolas
94.plot: As all the magic is sucked out of Edolas, the public panics, and three unlikely villains set about trashing the city. It looks like Fairy Tail will finally be transported back to their world--but not everyone will be returning with them.

95.title: Lisanna
95.plot: The guild finally returns to Earthland--along with a few other surprises. The Exceeds make it their mission to track down all their missing children, Gajeel gets a new partner, and a long-lost guild member makes a shocking return.

96.title: He Who Extinguishes Life
96.plot: Rebuilding begins in the plane of Edolas as everyone tries to figure out what to do now that there is no magic left in the world. Back in Magnolia, Fairy Tail celebrates the return of Lisanna as the magic council debates the guild's future.

97.title: Best Partners
97.plot: Natsu, Gray, Juvia, Elfman, Cana, Fried, Levy, and Mystogan's disciple Mest are selected to participate in Fairy Tail's annual S-Class promotion exam, and are instructed to choose a partner to accompany them during the exam.

98.title: Who's the Lucky One?
98.plot: The exam participants arrive at Sirius Island, Fairy Tail's sacred ground, where they each take one of eight routes that will lead to the next stage of the exam. Most of these routes either pit the participants against each other or one of Fairy Tail's S-Class wizards, who they must defeat in order to advance.

99.title: Natsu vs. Gildarts
99.plot: Juvia and Lisanna are pitted against Erza, while Elfman and Evergreen are pitted against Mirajane. Meanwhile, Natsu enthusiastically fights Gildarts, with a series of flashbacks detailing how Natsu had never once been able to defeat him since childhood.

100.title: Mest
100.plot: Guild members begin to wonder about Mest, who has a peculiar place in their memories. Meanwhile, only five duos are left in the exam as the second trial begins and the wizards are tasked with finding the grave of Fairy Tail's founding guild master.

101.title: Black Wizard
101.plot: Natsu attacks the black-haired youth to no effect, causing the youth to despair that Natsu is not strong enough to defeat him. The youth unleashes another wave of deadly magic against Natsu and disappears, but Natsu is protected from the attack by his scarf, which turns black.

102.title: Iron Soul
102.plot: Gajeel and Levy fight Kawazu and Yomazu, who reveal that they are scouting the island to kill the Fairy Tail wizards. Though seriously wounded, Gajeel sends Levy to warn their guildmates of Grimoire Heart's attack.

103.title: Makarov Strikes
103.plot: While being interrogated, Mest rescues Wendy from an attack by Azuma, one of the Seven Kin. Mest reveals himself to be a Magic Council agent named Doranbalt, sent to search for incriminating evidence against Fairy Tail and disband it.

104.title: Lost Magic
104.plot: Makarov is defeated and gravely wounded in his battle against Hades, which is sensed by the wandering Laxus. Meanwhile, the other members of Fairy Tail battle Grimoire Heart's army.

105.title: Fire Dragon vs. Flame God
105.plot: Natsu is overwhelmed by Zancrow's God Slayer magic, which proves superior to his own Dragon Slayer magic.

106.title: The Ultimate Magic World
106.plot: Azuma learns of Mirajane's former identity as the "Demon" and straps Lisanna to a time bomb so he can fight Mirajane at full strength.

107.title: Arc of Embodiment
107.plot: Elfman and Evergreen are overwhelmed and defeated by Rustyrose's Arc of Incarnation, which gives him the power to create anything from his imagination. Meanwhile, Loke realizes Caprico is the celestial spirit Capricorn, and that he has the power to take control of humans.

108.title: The Door of Humans
108.plot: Caprico reveals himself to be a human named Zoldio who fused with Capricorn using his Human Subordination magic. He possesses Loke, but Loke gives his Regulus ring to the newly freed Capricorn.

109.title: Lucy Fire
109.plot: Lucy and Hikaru's battle interrupts Natsu's battle with Ultear, leading Natsu to help Lucy and reform their old team while Ultear leaves with Zeref.

110.title: Dead-End of Despair
110.plot: Doranbalt tries to help Natsu and his friends evacuate the island as the Magic Council plans to fire Etherion once again, but they refuse to leave. Meanwhile, Juvia is nearly defeated during her and Erza's battle against Merudy of the Seven Kin.

111.title: The Tears of Love and Life
111.plot: When Gray, Juvia, and a Grimoire Heart wizard are linked together by a dark magic, one wrong move could mean the death of all three of them. Meanwhile, Ultear's past is revealed as she confronts Gray--the one she holds responsible for her mother's death.

112.title: The One Thing I Couldn't Say
112.plot: Cana discovers the grave of Mavis, Fairy Tail's founding master. After thinking about her troubled past--and connection the Gildarts--she receives the powerful spell Fairy Glitter. But even this magic might not be enough to take out Grimoire Heart.

113.title: Tenrou Tree
113.plot: The guild continues to take on the members of Grimoire Heart as Erza goes head-to-head with Azuma. But when the dark wizard becomes one with the island flora, a secret magic is revealed and the island itself falls into peril.

114.title: Erza vs. Azuma
114.plot: With all the magic suddenly drained from their bodies, the wizards of Fairy Tail are powerless against their enemies. Their lives depend on one guild mate--Erza--but even she might not have the strength to save them.

115.title: Frozen Spirit
115.plot: The battle against Grimoire Heart continues as everyone's power suddenly returns! Gray vows to stop the dark guild using Iced Shell--sacrificing himself in the process--at the suggestion of Ultear, his former-teacher's daughter.

116.title: The Power That Becomes Life
116.plot: After confirming her treachery, Gray take on Ultear, channeling the memory of his former teacher in a dangerous attempt to defeat the time-altering wizard. But as Ultear's history comes to light, it's more complicated than even she realizes.

117.title: Thunder Crashes
117.plot: The guild splits up into teams in order to strike back against Grimoire Heart, taking the fight straight to Hades. Elsewhere on the island, Zeref's power is unleashed, taking out members from both sides of the battle.

118.title: The Man Without the Mark
118.plot: A surprise appearance from one of Fairy Tail's expelled members gives the team a fighting chance. Meanwhile, Happy, Carla, and Panther Lily search the dark guild's ship as they try to find the source of its powers.

119.title: Realm of the Abyss
119.plot: Powered by fire AND lightning, Natsu strikes out against the leader of Grimoire Heart, just as he unleashes a demonic magic assault. When Happy, Carla, and Panther Lily finally find the heart of the dark guild's ship, they're attacked by lackeys.

120.title: Daybreak at Tenrou Island
120.plot: The island's magic tree is brought back to life by an unexpected source, restoring power to the members of Fairy Tail, who rally for one final group attack--but will the guild's mercy be their undoing? And why is Erza dressed in a nurse's uniform?

121.title: The Right to Love
121.plot: Fairy Tail may have defeated Grimoire Heart, but it is the Black Wizard Zeref who will ultimately punish the dark guild. Meanwhile, Cana finally spills her family secret to Gildarts.

122.title: Let's Join Hands
122.plot: As Fairy Tail recovers from their recent battles, a black dragon--Acnologia--appears in the sky. Even with the combined powers of every guild member, the wizards are helpless to stop its destruction of the magic island.

123.title: X791 Fairy Tail
123.plot: Seven years have passed since most of Fairy Tail's wizards disappeared following a dragon's attack. In that time, the guild has fallen into disrepair and lost its standing. Is there any hope that the wizards will return before the guild falls apart?

124.title: The Empty Seven Years
124.plot: Everyone learns about what they missed in the last 7 years.

125.title: Magic Dance Ball
125.plot: Fairy Tail takes an assignment to protect a rich family from being robbed during their semi-annual ball.

126.title: The Truly Evil Jiggle Butt Gang
126.plot: Natsu's motion sickness gets out of control as the members of Fairy Tail escort a client's giant shipment of gold via train. With the dragon slayer down for the count, can the others protect the freight from the notorious Butt Jiggle Gang?

127.title: The Terror of Invisible Lucy
127.plot: Lucy uses an expired magical ointment and accidentally turns her invisible. Her newfound powers provide plenty of hijinks, but what happens when she can't figure out how to become visible again--and everything around her starts disappearing?

128.title: Father's Memento
128.plot: A mysterious girl claiming to be Lucy's distant relative shows up at the guild with a relic she says Lucy's father wanted to make sure was in his daughter's hands. But there may be more to this artifact--and girl--than meets the eye.

129.title: Raging Showdown! Natsu vs. Laxus
129.plot: Lucy and Michelle work on solving the inscription on her gift. While a festival is held in honor of Natsu and Laxus's rematch. Grey and Ezra go on an assignment together.

130.title: Targeted Lucy
130.plot: Earth Land versions of Edolas villains show up to Fairy Tail to take Lucy.

131.title: Legion's Fierceness
131.plot: Gildarts enters the fray as Fairy Tail continues to battle the mysterious wizards who have come for Lucy. As spells fly, the truth about who the attackers are starts to come to light--along with what they're really after.

132.title: Key of the Starry Heaven
132.plot: In order to track down Lucy's stolen key, several members of Fairy Tail visit the old Heartfilia mansion to see if there are any clues about the relic's history there. The search is a success, but is interrupted by unexpected members of the Legion Corps.

133.title: Traveling Companions
133.plot: By studying the book from the Heartfilia library, Lucy discovers that there are five more clock pieces hidden throughout the world. Fairy Tail splits up to hunt them down before the Legion can, and the groups run into strange characters on the road.

134.title: Labyrinth Rhapsody
134.plot: Natus and Lucy's expedition team discovers a strange gateway in the middle of the desert that leads to a dangerous underground dungeon. Elsewhere, Gray's team discovers a puzzle-filled cave--and Sugar Boy.

135.title: Trail of the Myth
135.plot: Natsu team runs into two members of the Legion Corps in the underground dungeon. Lucy gets shrunk, Happy becomes a giant, and the only way for the wizards to prevail might be through really bad smells and...marriage?!

136.title: The True Villain, Once Again
136.plot: The Butt Jiggle Gang is back and they're dead-set on finding one of the mysterious clock parts before Fairy Tail does. In order to get ahead of them, Erza dons one of their skintight black uniforms and teaches them the meaning of true villainy.

137.title: That Which Exceeds Calculation
137.plot: As the Fairy Tail expedition teams continue to discover clock components, Legion Corps ramps up its assault against the guild. When Samuel and Pantherlily go head to head, it's an Exceed battle like the wizards have never seen before.

138.title: The Whereabouts of the Crusade
138.plot: One of Legion's members manages to separate Mirajane's demon form from her body and uses it to attack the wizard's family! Meanwhile, the secret order's crusade finally comes to light along with the terrifying truth behind the infinity clock.

139.title: The Moment That's Activated
139.plot: Natsu's team of wizards goes head-to-head with Byro, a powerful adversary with the power to nullify magic attacks. Elsewhere, the members of Zentopia grow restless as the Archbishop's condition continues to worsen.

140.title: Reborn Oración Seis Appears!
140.plot: One of Fairy Tail's most powerful enemies--Oracion Seis--has been reborn, and the members are now deadlier than ever. When they show up demanding the Infinity Clock, will anyone be able to stand in their way?

141.title: Chase the Infinite Clock!
141.plot: As Fairy Tail recovers from their encounter with the new Oracian Seis, Kinana enters a trance-like state and carves something in an ancient language into the walls of the guild. Meanwhile, the Legion Platoon gets a strange new member.

142.title: The Dissonance of Battle
142.plot: Lahar tracks down a jaded Doranbolt--who now goes by Mest--at a pub, Laki and Gildarts discover a creepy set of nuns, and Fairy Tail's newest teams face off against members of the new Oracion Seis (along with some members of the Legion Platoon).

143.title: Anti-Link
143.plot: As Fairy Tail and Legion Platoon wizards face off with members of the reborn Oracion Seis, Mest and Lahar discover a Celestial Wizard named Katja who has important information about Zentopia--and a connection to Will Neville.

144.title: Unleashed Despair
144.plot: Now that it's been confirmed the new Oración Seis is actually targeting select Celestial Wizards and not churches, the truth about Michelle is revealed. As the Infinity Clock begins to work, it's catastrophic magic blackens the sky.

145.title: Real Nightmare
145.plot: Archaeologists show up at the guild's headquarters with background on Jude Heartfilia and the Infinity Clock--as well as a powerful evil-vanquishing hammer. Meanwhile, Natsu tries to escape a magical prison with the help of...the Butt Jiggle Gang?!

146.title: The Spiral of Time
146.plot: As the Infinity Clock's powers begin to activate, the world descends into chaos. Fairy Tail's special team heads to the Infinity Clock, where Lucy is being prepared as a sacrifice. Meanwhile, the deep corruption within Zentopia is finally exposed.

147.title: To the Infinity Castle!
147.plot: The Legion Platoon turns their sights on Lucy, vowing to destroy her in order to save the rest of the world from the Infinity Clock. As Wendy tries to heal the Archbishop, Happy comes up with a plan that could save Lucy, but time is running out.

148.title: The Angel's Tears
148.plot: The Infinity Clock's magic continues to wreak havoc on the world as a handful of Fairy Tail wizards make a last-chance effort to save Lucy and stop the Real Nightmare. Four members of Oración Seis must be defeated, but can Gray defeat a host of angels?

149.title: A Friend's Voice Is Heard
149.plot: Three dark wizards must be defeated to save the world, but Lucy's body has almost completely merged with the Infinity Clock. When the Archbishop wakes, he's able to explain how the clock operates, and how Fairy Tail might stall the Real Nightmare.

150.title: Lucy and Michelle
150.plot: As Lucy becomes one with the Infinity Clock, she finds herself floating in a realm of memories. There, she comes to terms with who--or what--Michelle is, and the role the girl played in her past. In the end, they may be the only ones able to save the world.

151.title: Sabertooth
151.plot: Former enemies make amends and Fairy Tail continues to try to repair its reputation as the Fiore Kingdom reels from recent crises. Meanwhile, the Legion Platoon is given a new mission, and Makarov shows Gildarts the guild's greatest secret.

152.title: And We Aim for the Top
152.plot: Natsu unleashes an electrifying new move! Inspired, the guild goes in search of a way to increase their magic power without actually putting in the work of training. Meanwhile, leadership of the guild changes hands...more than once.

153.title: Song of the Stars
153.plot: As Natsu and the gang prepare for the Grand Magic Games, Lucy gets an alarming call from Virgo. She leads them to the Celestial Spirit World, where they come across a great surprise.

154.title: Only Enough Time to Pass by One Another
154.plot: As guilds across the Fiore Kingdom prepare for the games, three powerful enemies from Fairy Tail's past show up and ask the guild for a favor. In return, they offer Natsu and his teammates a painful power-up that will take their magic to the next level.

155.title: The Blooming Capital: Crocus
155.plot: Fairy Tail's five representatives for the Grand Magic Games are chosen! But trouble follows the guild to the capital of the Fiore Kingdom, and if all the reps aren't back to their assigned inn by midnight, they may be out before the games even begin.

156.title: Sky Labyrinth
156.plot: The first elimination challenge has begun, and representatives from Fairy Tail have to navigate a giant labyrinth in the sky quickly if they want to be one of the guilds that move on to the next round. The only problem? One of their members is missing.

157.title: New Guild
157.plot: Having barely qualified to continue in the Grand Magic Games, one of Fairy Tail's representatives has to be replaced. As the competing guilds are introduced, Natsu and the others size up their competition--which includes an unexpected set of foes.

158.title: In a Night of Falling Stars
158.plot: The Grand Magic Games have begun! Gray represents one of Fairy Tail's teams on the first day of the competition in a magical hide-and-seek challenge carried out in a playing field full of multiple copies of the contestants.

159.title: Lucy vs. Flare
159.plot: Raven Tail has been picking on Fairy Tail from the beginning, but now that Lucy is up against one of their wizards--Flare--the guilds are truly going head-to-head! Whichever wizard gets knocked out first loses, but just what is the dark guild after?

160.title: Bad Omen
160.plot: The battles continue as wizards from the competing guilds go spell-for-spell in the stadium center. When Jellal-as-Mystogan takes on a member of Lamia Scale, will he be able to make up for all of Fairy Tail's previous losses?

161.title: Chariots
161.plot: After being completely annihilated on the first day of the Grand Magic Games, Fairy Tail tries to recover and keep high spirits for the remaining rounds. Elsewhere, the captain of the guard is up to something suspicious, and Carla has a terrible vision.

162.title: Elfman vs. Bacchus
162.plot: Elfman takes center stage as he fights a talented martial artist--and unveils a powerful new beast form! Meanwhile, Raven Tail continues to bully the other guilds, and two of Fairy Tail's members are kidnapped from the infirmary.

163.title: Mirajane vs. Jenny
163.plot: A battle between Mirajane and a pinup model from Blue Pegasus turns into a knock-down-drag-out fight of sexy poses and costume changes. As the arena fills with bikini-clad wizards, a dark plot against one of Fairy Tail's members unfolds behind the scenes.

164.title: Kagura vs. Yukino
164.plot: As the second day of the Grand Magic Games draws to a close, an epic fight between Sabertooth's powerful celestial wizard and Mermaid Heel's leaping swordswoman rocks the stadium. Later, Erza comes across a spritely figure from her past.

165.title: Malice Is Concealed by the Veil of Darkness
165.plot: After Yukino is expelled from Saber Tooth, she offers her two golden Gatekeys to Lucy to complete the latter's collection of the Zodiac Gatekeys, stating that when the twelve Zodiac Gatekeys are all gathered, a gateway that changes the world will open.

166.title: Pandemonium
166.plot: After Natsu punches out Dobengal, the guild member summoned to fight him, he and Jiemma engage in a duel. However, the guild master's daughter Minerva appears.

167.title: 100 Versus 1
167.plot: Erza kills the 100 monsters using various types of armor to match their strength and weaknesses.

168.title: Laxus vs. Alexei
168.plot: As the battles continue to rage in the Grand Magic Games, an ancient magic is performed in the stadium. Later, Laxus takes on Raven Tail-his father's guild-but there's much more to this epic match than meets the eye.

169.title: Wendy vs. Chelia
169.plot: After Laxus defeats Ivan and the four Raven Tail elite members, Ivan's illusions disappear to the shock of everyone in the stadium. Later, Wendy of Fairy Tail Team A and Sherria Blendy of Team Lamia Scale face off to compete for the final match of the day.

170.title: A Small Fist
170.plot: With Cheria being fully healed and Wendy being almost depleted of magic power, their battle continues, with the former casting a high-level spell towards the latter. However, it seems that Wendy enhances Cheria's physical strength, causing the attack to gain much force and thus missing Wendy.

171.title: Naval Battle
171.plot: As the jubilant Fairy Tail members celebrate their victories, the other people, such as Sting, Kagura, and Milliana, are contemplating on their own concerns, while Yukino is enlisted as a sergeant under Arcadios' command. Meanwhile, the fourth day of the competitions comes to a start with an event, "Naval Battle", which involves the participants swimming in a giant water sphere and knocking the other competitors out.

172.title: The Perfume Dedicated to You
172.plot: While Lucy is hospitalized and taken to the infirmary, the Fairy Tail members warn Saber Tooth that they have angered the worst possible guild to do so. Later, Makarov announces that the two Fairy Tail teams must merge as a result of the disqualification of Raven Tail.

173.title: Battle of Dragon Slayers
173.plot: Mermaid Heel's Kagura and Milliana and Lamia Scale's Lyon and Yuka face off for the second tag battle of the games. For the third and final match of the day, the spectators look on in silence as Natsu and Gajeel of Team Fairy Tail and Sting and Rogue of Team Saber Tooth enter the field.

174.title: Four Dragons
174.plot: The tag battle continues, with Sting and Rogue beginning to attack Natsu and Gajeel with their powers being increased.

175.title: Natsu vs. The Twin Dragons
175.plot: The tag battle of the Dragon Slayers comes to a close, with Natsu overpowering the combined attacks of Sting and Rogue. The Saber Tooth members watch in dismay, while Jiemma seethes in anger.

1.title: King of the Dragons
1.plot: Following Sting and Rogue's defeat, Ziemma furiously attempts to expel the two from Saber Tooth. When Lector defends Sting, Ziemma seemingly kills him, prompting Sting to blast the guild master through the chest.

2.title: The Eclipse Project
2.plot: Arcadios reveals the details of the top-secret Eclipse Project to Natsu and friends, but things quickly go awry when Lucy is taken into custody.

3.title: Fairy Tactician
3.plot: Mavis reveals her incredible skill as a strategist as the final event of the Grand Magic Games begins. Meanwhile, Natsu's squad tries to rescue Lucy.

4.title: Gray vs. Rufus
4.plot: Gray squares off against Rufus in a Make magic rematch. Meanwhile, Natsu and friends devise a unique way to escape from their imprisonment.

5.title: The Hungry Wolf Knights
5.plot: Sabertooth has a new master. And Fairy Tail may be on top of the Grand Magic Games, but below the palace, Natsu and the others are still trapped in Palace Hell. And then things get worse when the hunters become the hunted - by the Garou Knights.

6.title: Fairy Tail vs. Executioners
6.plot: Though their appearances may be foolish, the Garou Knights are the strongest executioners in the kingdom. And now, the members of Fairy Tail's "away team" are separated from each other and forced into one-on-one combat against the knights.

7.title: Scorching Earth
7.plot: Lucy and Yukino team up and use their celestial spirits to battle the powerful Uosuke.

8.title: Our Place
8.plot: Natsu and friends teach the Hungry Wolf Knights who's boss, once and for all.

9.title: The Kingdom 'til Tomorrow
9.plot: Erza, Kagura, and Minerva face each other in an unpredictable, three-way battle. Meanwhile, Natsu and friends make an unexpected encounter.

10.title: Erza vs. Kagura
10.plot: Future Lucy collapses and is taken in by Natsu's team, while Princess Hisui and Jellal ponder over the upcoming calamity. Meanwhile, as Gajeel and Laxus square off against Rogue and Olga, respectively, Minerva pits Erza and Kagura against each other before leaving with Millianna.

11.title: A Future Racing Toward Despair
11.plot: The battle between Erza and Kagura comes to a surprising end. Meanwhile, Future Lucy reveals the horrific incident that will soon unfold.

12.title: Frog
12.plot: Gajeel and Rogue face off in an unusual, surprising battle. Future Lucy puts her knowledge of events to good use, but something still seems strange.

13.title: Roaring Thunder!
13.plot: Using his new shadow powers, Gajeel overpowers and finally defeats the possessed Rogue. The shadow exits Rogue's body, erasing his memory of the fight.

14.title: Gloria
14.plot: The final battle of the Grand Magic Games is about to come to an end, but Fairy Tail faces one last foe.

15.title: The One Who Closes the Gate
15.plot: Jellal makes an unexpected realization about Future Lucy. Meanwhile, Natsu and friends come face-to-face with the same revelation.

16.title: Natsu vs. Rogue
16.plot: All the guild wizards in Crocus unite to defend Fiore from the looming dragon threat. Elsewhere, Natsu battles the future version of Rogue.

17.title: For Me, Too
17.plot: The guild wizards must face the ferocious dragons in battle while Lucy struggles to shut the Eclipse gate.

18.title: Seven Dragons
18.plot: Fairy Tail and the other guilds face an impossible task: defeat the seven dragons that came through the Eclipse gate.

19.title: Zirconis' Magic
19.plot: As the dragons' assault intensifies, Zirconis unleashes a surprising new spell. Meanwhile, Natsu continues to struggle against Future Rogue.

20.title: Human and Human, Dragon and Dragon, Human and Dragon
20.plot: Natsu jumps onto the back of the fire dragon Atlas Flame and begins eating the flames covering his body. Back in Crocus, Rogue Learn that his future self is responsible for the attack on Crocus. Ultear plots to kill Rogue.

21.title: Sin and Sacrifice
21.plot: Millianna finally confronts Jellal in the middle of the war-torn city. Elsewhere, the battle against the smaller dragons takes a drastic turn.

22.title: Time of Life
22.plot: Ultear uses her ultimate time-manipulation spell to try to undo recent events - but at great cost.

23.title: Golden Grasslands
23.plot: The Fairy Tail wizards focus all their power on the Eclipse gate in a last-ditch effort to destroy it and change the future.

24.title: The Grand Ball
24.plot: The King throws a ball to celebrate the end of the battle.

25.title: Drop of Time
25.plot: The fairy tail members start heading home. Dorenbolt wipes the memory of the council to hide the battle with dragons. Jellal and Meldy are looking for Ultear when a mysterious elderly lady gives them a letter from her.

26.title: A Gift
26.plot: Upon returning home, Fairy Tail receives a gift from the Mayor. Natsu, Lucy and Happy accept a job to get rid of a monster.

27.title: Welcome Home, Frosch
27.plot: Frosch goes missing when shopping with Lector and is determined to make it back to Sabertooth by himself, bumping into various members of other guilds along the way. The members of Sabertooth cheer him on from the sidelines.

28.title: Moulin Rouge
28.plot: When Erza sees a white cue ball used in playing billiards, she tells her story of her first experience in billiards and her first encounter with Moulin Rogue.

29.title: Full Effort Hospitality!
29.plot: As thanks for helping them close the Eclipse Gate, Lucy and Yukino invite each of their celestial spirits to Star Hill to grant each of them a wish.

30.title: Beacon of Rebellion
30.plot: Lucy and Yukino are unable to summon their Zodiac celestial spirits. A change in the celestial spirit world causes the Zodiac spirits to lose their memories and their personalities change.

31.title: Panic of Library
31.plot: Fairy Tail split into teams to do research on the Liberam. As usual Natsu does not follow the plan and sneaks into the spirit world alone. Virgo attacks the library where Lucy, Levy and Yukino are.

32.title: Hisui Rises
32.plot: The Princess and Arcadios reveal the reason behind the changes in the spirit world and give them a way to force-close zodiac gates. Natsu, Lucy, Levy and Yukino fight against Pisces.

33.title: Astral Spirytus
33.plot: Natsu's team interrupts the zodiac's Liberam ritual and a fight ensues. The rest of Fairy Tail arrives to back them up. They follow the zodiac spirits into the rift between the human and celestial worlds. Elfman battles Taurus.

34.title: Wendy vs. Aquarius - Let's Play at an Amusement Park
34.plot: Cana battles Cancer in a card game while Wendy and Aquarius play at the amusement park. Natsu joins Wendy after Loke knocks him into the amusement park.

35.title: Guild Deck vs. Celestial Spirit Deck
35.plot: While Cana continues to battle Cancer in a card game, Levy faces Capricorn in a trivia quiz and Mirajane fights Pisces in an underwater battle.

36.title: Gray vs. Cancer - Dance Battle!
36.plot: Gray and Cancer dance off in a battle.

37.title: Juvia vs. Aries - Clash in the Desert!
37.plot: Levy must make a confession to win the trivia quiz against Capricorn, and Natsu and Wendy run into the snake charmer celestial spirit, Ophiuchus. Meanwhile, Juvia struggles to fight Aries in the desert.

38.title: Erza vs. Sagittarius - Horseback Showdown!
38.plot: Gajeel and Panther Lily are transformed into small animals by Gemini during their battle with the twin spirits, but Gajeel eventually discovers he can still use his magic and easily knocks them out. Meanwhile, Sagittarius challenges Erza to three horseriding contests.

39.title: Natsu vs. Leo
39.plot: Loke re-starts the Liberam ritual. Natsu fight him while Wendy, Happy and Charle try to steal the celestial globe.

40.title: The Ophiuchus Constellation
40.plot: Natsu and Arcadios fight Ophiuchus. Natsu combines the twelve celestial realms so Lucy and Yukino must stop Virgo and Libra together. It is revealed the closure of the spirits' gates was all apart of the Celestial Spirit King's plan.

41.title: When the Stars Are Filled All Over
41.plot: Natsu's group continues to fight against Ophiuchus, but her weapon proves difficult to beat. The rest of Fairy Tail figure out a way to stop the Astral Spiritus.

42.title: The Sacred Starbeast
42.plot: Although Ophiuchus was defeated, the ritual wasn't stopped in time. Fairy Tail enters the celestial spirit world to prevent its destruction. They're faced with the Eclipse Celestial Spirit King, who begins to turn them into constellations.

43.title: Believe
43.plot: Natsu enters the Celestial Beast to free the Celestial King and spirits. After the Clestial Spirit World is saved, the spirits lose their memories of the events and return to normal.

44.title: What a True Heart Weaves
44.plot: Natsu looks after Asca for a day while Bisca and Alzack are on a job.

45.title: 413 Days
45.plot: It is the 413th day since Juvia met Gray. She asks the guild members what would make the perfect anniversary gift for him.

46.title: The White Silver Labyrinth
46.plot: Natsu, Lucy and Happy travel up Mt. Hakobe to get special Hakobe ice. They become lost in a living cave and run out of food.

47.title: Transform!
47.plot: Natsu and Lucy try to learn transformation magic. Macao and Wakaba also try to learn but become monsters. Erza, Gajeel and Lily become superheroes and must defeat them.

48.title: Kemokemo Arrived!
48.plot: When an egg falls from the sky, Natsu decides to raise it. Fairy Tail participants in a student exchange program between guilds, so Natsu, Lucy, Gray and Erza decide to go to find out more about the mystery animal.

49.title: The Place You Came Before
49.plot: After an island emerges from the sea, a Fairy-Sabertooth coalition is formed to find the source of the mysterious life signs that the Magic Council detected. Kemo-Kemo remembers his purpose.

50.title: The Thunder Man
50.plot: A town plagued by lightening asks for Laxus' help. It is thought Laxus may be the cause of their problem.

51.title: Fairy Tail of the Dead Meeeeeeeeen
51.plot: A potion created by Sir Ichiya pollutes Magnolia and turns its residents into Ichiya zombies.

1.title: The Morning of a New Adventure
1.plot: Natsu and Gray go on a mission together. When they take longer than expected, Erza, Lucy and Wendy check up on them. When they return, Natsu and Gray receive a job request from a Saint Wizard.

2.title: Wizards vs. Hunters
2.plot: Natsu's team arrive at Sun Village, a village that has entirely frozen over - including its people. They run into a treasure hunter guild called Sylph Labyrinth who are trying to steal the Eternal Flame.

3.title: Law of Retrogression
3.plot: Erza turns into a child while trying to find the Eternal Flame and runs into Minerva, who has joined a dark guild. Natsu is also turned into a child by Doriate. Lucy and Wendy fight the treasure hunters and are saved by Flare.

4.title: The Devil Returns
4.plot: Lucy, Wendy and Flare fight the treasure hunters. Erza fights Minerva but her powers have been extremely reduced. While Natsu is trying to locate the source of the voice he heard, Gray is turned into a child and fights Doriate.

5.title: Gray vs. Doriate
5.plot: Although Gray's magic power has decreased, his tactical skills have not, and he outwits Doriate. Doriate loses control and transforms into a demon, turning the remaining people on the island into children.

6.title: Voice of the Flame
6.plot: Natsu fights a monster while Gray tries to thaw the Eternal Flame, but when the ice melts, only a small flame remains. Natsu ignites the flame with his fire power, and discovers who the voice he heard belongs to.

7.title: Song of the Fairies
7.plot: After the village is saved, it is revealed the Silver Demon Slayer mistook the Eternal Flame for a demon and froze it along with the village. The group spends an evening at a hidden hot-springs with the Wizard Saint Warrod.

8.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: The Nine Demon Gates
8.plot: Peace has returned to the Fairy Tail guild, but trouble is brewing for the Magic Council. At long last, the powerful Tartaros dark guild springs into action with full force!

9.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: Fairies vs. Netherworld
9.plot: Laxus fights a mysterious and powerful Tartaros enemy who's out to kill an old Council member. And, after everything that's happened, Fairy Tail declares war on Tartaros!

10.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: The White Legacy
10.plot: Jackal is bent on taking the life of former Council member Michello, but Fairy Tail stands in the way. Natsu and friends try to stop Jackal, but quickly learn that they're facing no ordinary foe!

11.title: Tartarus Arc Prologue: Natsu vs. Jackal
11.plot: Multiple Fairy Tail teams rush to protect former Council members from the deadly Tartaros guild. But things look bleak even for Natsu's team...

12.title: Immorality and Sinners
12.plot: Erza and Mirajane rush to protect Crawford, the former Magic Council chairman. Meanwhile, Doranbolt frees the Oración Seis, and Natsu has a shocking realization about Tartaros...

13.title: Jellal vs. Oración Seis
13.plot: Natsu and Happy find where the Tartaros guild has been hiding! Happy rushes to alert the rest of Fairy Tail, but little does anyone know that an unexpected trap has been set. Elsewhere, Jellal singlehandedly fights the members of Oración Seis.

14.title: A Place Reached by Prayer
14.plot: Jellal's life is the final key to unsealing the devastating Face weapon. But Tartaros is bent on finding him, and the Oración Seis already have him in dire straits...

15.title: The Demon's Rebirth
15.plot: Elfman's attempt to blow up Fairy Tail reaches its explosive conclusion! Elsewhere, Lummy begins to transform Mirajane into a hideous creation meant to do Tartaros' bidding. This looks like the end for the Fairy Tail guild!

16.title: To Let Live or Die
16.plot: The legendary Zeref has a special one-on-one meeting with Natsu. Other members of Fairy Tail discover that the terrifying Face weapon has been activated. They quickly set out to stop it, but they meet with heavy resistance!

17.title: Wendy vs. Ezel
17.plot: Natsu must fight a demon that can absorb other beings' souls and take their form... including one of a surprising character! Elsewhere, Wendy and Carla rush to stop the Face from detonating, but they're greeted by a formidable foe.

18.title: Friends Forever
18.plot: Wendy has unleashed a new power from within herself, but can she master it in time to stop the doomsday Face weapon?! And what of Natsu and friends, as they face a grotesque version of the almighty Master Hades?!

19.title: Hell's Core
19.plot: After the secret of Tartaros' strength is revealed, Mirajane and Seilah face off in an intense battle. The only problem: they're immune to each other's powers! Meanwhile, Erza reunites with an old foe with new strength...

20.title: Underworld King
20.plot: Rustyrose of Grimoire Heart suddenly appears before Jellal, Meldy, and the Oración Seis. He shares his encounter with Tartaros' formidable Kyoka... but things aren't quite what they seem.

21.title: Alegria
21.plot: Mirajane struggles against the demon Seilah, whose full potential has been unleashed. Elsewhere, the Underworld King takes control of the chaotic situation by showing everyone who's boss!

22.title: Attack of the Celestials
22.plot: Everyone in Fairy Tail has fallen victim to Mard Geer's Alegria technique... except for Lucy. Unfortunately, that means she must face off with the mighty Tartaros guild all alone!

23.title: The Celestial King vs. The Underworld King
23.plot: Out of strength and on the verge of defeat, Lucy makes a great sacrifice to summon the Celestial Spirit King. Tartaros' base is quickly decimated, and soon the Celestial Spirit King and the Underworld King reunite...

24.title: Erza vs. Minerva
24.plot: Wendy and Carla learn the full truth of Tartaros' Face plan, and it's not good. Elsewhere, Erza faces off with Minerva, who has undergone a demonic transformation. At last, their final showdown is at hand!

25.title: A Young Boy's Story
25.plot: Sabertooth members arrive to lend backup in the war against Tartaros! While Erza rushes to find the guild's control room, Gray learns the shocking truth about Silver...

26.title: Gray vs. Silver
26.plot: Juvia continues to battle with the enigmatic Keyes. Elsewhere, Gray faces off with Silver in a showdown that's been ten long years in the making!

27.title: Silver Memories
27.plot: Silver reveals his true past to Gray once and for all and Juvia is tasked with defeating Keyes to stop the Faces and save the day.

28.title: Air
28.plot: While Natsu and Gajeel are fighting their opponents, a mysterious black water begins to flood the grounds and saps their strength. One by one they start to pass out, with Gajeel's iron skin the only thing keeping him conscious.

29.title: Steel
29.plot: Levy gives Gajeel air and he finally unleashes the strength to defeat Torafuzar. Laxus returns for a rematch against Tempester, but he is hiding something.

30.title: The Final Duels
30.plot: Laxus' battle intensifies and he has one last trick up his sleeve to put Tempester down for good, but will Erza's group make it to the control room in time to stop face from activating?

31.title: Wings of Despair
31.plot: Kyoka absorbs Selia's power, and she and Erza begin their battle. The guild is shocked by the arrival of past foe looking to destroy E.N.D., and Natsu hears Igneel call out to him.

32.title: The Fire Dragon's Iron Fist
32.plot: Igneel fights Achnologia and tasks Natsu with stealing the Book of E.N.D. from the King of the underworld. Kyoka forms a living link with the Face activation device in order to speed up the process.

33.plot: Kyoka breaks through all of Erza's armors and takes away her 5 senses. Will Erza still be able to beat her before Face activates?

34.title: The Girl in the Crystal
34.plot: Natsu, Sting, and Rogue struggle against the Underworld King. Master Macarov reveals the ace that has been kept a secret among the masters of Fairy Tail.

35.title: The Definitive Demon
35.plot: Mard Geer reveals why Zeref created the demons. Gray shows off his new powers but is struck down by Jiemma, who has been transformed into a demon.

36.title: Memento Mori
36.plot: Sting and Rogue take down Jiemma. The battle between Mard Geer and Natsu and Gray rages on, until Mard unleashes a curse called memento Mori.

37.title: Soaring in Ishgar
37.plot: The other guilds begin attacking the faces but to no avail. Gray and Natsu take down Mard Geer, but face has already activated. Will the appearance of surprise allies turn the tide of the battle?

38.title: Drops of Fire
38.plot: In this epilogue to the Tartaros saga, the dragons reveal a tragic secret to Fairy Tail, while Natsu makes a vow to Igneel's fading soul. In the aftermath, Makarov dissolves the guild, several members set out on their own quests, and Zeref drops a shocking revelation.

39.title: Where the Power of Life Lies
39.plot: Dorenbalt wipes the memories of the guild members, and another revelation is made about Dorenbalt. Macarov decides to disband the guild while members go on journeys to become stronger.

1.title: Fairy in the Heart
1.plot: After aimlessly wondering around for a week, Natsu and Happy go to Tenrou Island on a pilgrimage. Flashback to 100 years ago, an orphaned Mavis works at a guild who are then attacked by a rival guild.

2.title: The Beginning of the Adventure
2.plot: Mavis encounters treasure hunter Yuri Dreyar on Tenroujima and accepts his mind game challenge over the Tenrou Jade. This eventually leads to the beginning of a journey, but will Mavis's oldest and only friend Zera agree to go?

3.title: Treasure Hunt
3.plot: With no wind, the ship isn't going any where. Mavis takes advantage of the situation and explores and underwater shrine, but she runs into trouble.

4.title: Dances with Blades
4.plot: The crew finally arrives in Hargeon. Mavis and Precht go searching for information when they come across a shady bar.

5.title: A Moonlit Lake
5.plot: Yuri and Warrod argue, and Precht tells the story of when they tried to find the rainbow flower. A nasty surprise is waiting for them in Magnolia.

6.title: Blue Skull
6.plot: The group finds that Magnolia has been taken over by Blue Skull. When they fight, the Master sees through Mavis's illusions, rendering her magic useless against them.

7.title: The One Who Teaches Magic
7.plot: After their defeat by Blue Skull, Mavis encounters Zeref in the forest and convinces him to teach her and the group to use magic.

8.title: Treasure
8.plot: Mavis convinces the people of the town to join them and stand against Blue Skull. Yuri finds the Tenrou Orb but is cursed upon touching it.

9.title: Law
9.plot: Mavis defeats the dragon using a spell Zeref taught her, but using it before mastering it comes at a price. A shocking revelation about Zera is revealed.

10.title: An Eternal Adventure
10.plot: Mavis says goodbye to Zera and decides what her next big adventure is going to be.

11.title: Challenger
11.plot: It has been a year since the guild dissolved, and now Lucy is an apprentice reporter for Sorcerer Weekly. She is covering the Grand Magic Games in Crocus, where an unexpected challenger infiltrates the arena.

12.title: Message of Flame
12.plot: After finding that Guild is Disbanded, Natsu pulls a stunt to let everyone know Fairy Tail is back. Natsu, Lucy and Happy set out on a new adventure to return the scattered members.

imdb.plot outline: Lucy, a 17 year old girl, sets out on journey to become a full-fledged wizard and joins the strongest and most (in) famous guild FAIRY TAIL where she meets Natsu, Happy, Gray and Erza, who treat her more like family than friends. This epic series takes us through all the dangers that the members of fairy tail face and eventually overcome through mutual love and friendship.
imdb.title: Fairy Tail
plot: Lucy, an aspiring Celestial Wizard, becomes a friend and ally to powerful wizards Natsu, Gray, and Erza, who are part of the (in)famous wizard guild, _Fairy Tail_ (qv).::Tyler Smith

Lucy, a 17 year old girl, sets out on journey to become a full-fledged wizard and joins the strongest and most (in) famous guild FAIRY TAIL where she meets Natsu, Happy, Gray and Erza, who treat her more like family than friends. This epic series takes us through all the dangers that the members of fairy tail face and eventually overcome through mutual love and friendship.::AnimeLover

Lucy, a runaway celestial wizard, finds herself under the curse of a magic charm. Natsu Dragneel, a Dragon Slayer, and his sidekick, Happy, swoop in to save her from being sold on the black market. Causing massive property damage, is a specialty of _Fairy Tail_ (qv), as Lucy is soon to find out as she joins the magical guild. Lucy soon meets Gray and Erza, both are also wizards at _Fairy Tail_ (qv), Gray is an ice wizard with a cool personality and a special "hobby". Erza on the other hand is a wizard with requip magic, which allows her to switch armour and weapons at any moment. Through Arcs of all kinds _Fairy Tail_ (qv) sticks together::Ariadne
